wjhk.jupload2.policies
Class FilesTogetherUploadPolicy

java.lang.Object
  wjhk.jupload2.policies.DefaultUploadPolicy
      wjhk.jupload2.policies.FilesTogetherUploadPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
UploadPolicy
public class FilesTogetherUploadPolicy
extends DefaultUploadPolicy

Upload policy that is a simple box. It's a 'simple' drop target. Upload starts immediately, when files are dropped on the applet.
The only component displayed on the applet is the progress bar.

Author:
etienne_sf
